hero.title: Transform your medical documentation into clear and automated legal arguments
hero.subtitle: The artificial intelligence platform created for law firms that litigate personal injury cases.
hero.description: Organize, interpret and draft for you ‚Äî in minutes, not hours.

problems.title: Does this sound familiar? This is what slows down your legal team every week.
problems.subtitle: Millions in compensation are delayed (or lost) due to avoidable errors that this platform eliminates.

card1.title: üìÅ Disorganized documents ‚Üí Cause of legal errors
card1.description: PDFs, prescriptions and notes arrive by email, WhatsApp or scans. Losing a single document can dismantle your strategy.

card2.title: ‚è∞ Hours searching for data ‚Üí Lost billable time
card2.description: What was prescribed? When was the patient seen? Which exam was done first? Every search costs money and delays cases.

card3.title: ‚ö†Ô∏è Manual errors ‚Üí Weakened legal arguments
card3.description: Misinterpreted dates, omitted medications, or incorrect medical sequences can destroy a solid case.

card4.title: üìâ Inefficient processes ‚Üí Lost cases and revenue
card4.description: While you organize documents manually, competitors with AI are closing cases faster and with better results.

steps.title: Real legal automation from the first click

step1.title: Upload everything without worrying about format
step1.description: Disorganized PDFs, prescription photos or medical reports:
step1.detail: The platform classifies and reads them for you. No manual sorting, no lost files. Everything is automatically organized and ready to analyze.

step2.title: Ask the AI what you need
step2.description: Questions in natural language, with precise answers:
step2.detail: "What did the doctor prescribe on the day of the accident?" "How many studies were done in the first week?" Get instant answers linked to the original document.

step3.title: Download medical or legal letters ready to send
step3.description: Editable, complete and with all information already analyzed:
step3.detail: Hospital requests, medical reports, or legal initiation letters. Everything ready to sign, send, or incorporate into the lawsuit.

scenarios.title: What your legal team can achieve in minutes (used to take hours)
scenarios.subtitle: The platform's AI replaces hours of review, drafting and searching with instant precision.

item1.title: üìå Generate a medical letter in 2 minutes
item1.description: Before: 30 minutes of manual review and drafting. Now: you select the type, and AI assembles it with your data.

item2.title: üéØ Complete medical chronology in 5 minutes
item2.description: Before: Hours reviewing documents to create timeline. Now: AI automatically organizes dates, treatments, and medical evolution.

item3.title: ‚úÖ Hospital information request in 1 minute
item3.description: Before: Drafting formal letters from scratch. Now: AI generates the complete request with all legal requirements.

item4.title: ‚ö° Legal process initiation in 10 minutes
item4.description: Before: Days organizing evidence and arguments. Now: AI structures everything with medical data ready to sue.
